flawed_nl_solution:
Each week, David will spend 3 hours + 3 hours + 4 hours = <<3+3+4=10>>10 hours in class.
Add to that his 4 hours of small group work, 4 + 10 = <<4+10=41>>41 hours a week.
He will spend 41 hours x 24 weeks = <<41*24=984>>984 hours on the course.
#### 984

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 14, not 41. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
